sayings.content: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
sayings.author: Kevin Durant

sayings.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
sayings.author: Steve Jobs

sayings.content: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing.
sayings.author: Pele

sayings.content: Work hard in silence, let success be your noise.
The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand.
sayings.author: Vince Lombardi

sayings.content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
sayings.author: Colin Powell

sayings.content: Dreams don't work unless you do.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
sayings.author: Chris Grosser

sayings.content: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
sayings.author: Steve Jobs

sayings.content: Work until your idols become your rivals.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
sayings.author: Robert Collier

sayings.content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
sayings.author: Sam Levenson

sayings.content: The future depends on what you do today.
sayings.author: Mahatma Gandhi

sayings.content: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
sayings.author: Jimmy Johnson

sayings.content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
sayings.author: Mark Twain

sayings.content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
sayings.author: Peter Drucker

sayings.content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
sayings.author: John D. Rockefeller

sayings.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
sayings.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

sayings.content: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
sayings.author: Colin R. Davis

sayings.content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
sayings.author: Henry David Thoreau

sayings.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
sayings.author: Walt Disney

sayings.content: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
sayings.author: Bruce Lee

sayings.content: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
sayings.author: Roger Staubach

sayings.content: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
sayings.author: Harry Golden

sayings.content: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph!
The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs... one step at a time.
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
sayings.author: Thomas Edison

sayings.content: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
sayings.author: Gary Player
